analysis.key_quote: I vehemently oppose the Policy reclassification/Schedule F reclassification proposal. This change would directly undermine the Pendleton Civil Service Reform Act of 1883, which was enacted to combat the spoils system and establish a merit-based hiring process for federal employees.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, citing concerns about undermining the merit-based system established by the Pendleton Act and the risk of politicization in nonpartisan positions.
